description: SpeciedexNet connects to SpeciedexCore nodes to relay blocks, mempool entries, taxonomy/asset updates, and lineage events. It normalizes telemetry, exposes HTTP/WS APIs and a Prometheus metrics exporter, and can persist signed snapshots for audits and replay.
